com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Point, Polygon

    public class Shape
extends Object
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Author:
    wessles

        The center of mass. Basically the mean location of all vertices.

        Duplicate constructor.

      • Shape

        protected Shape(float... coords)
        Parameters:
        coords - The coordinates of all vertices in the shape. Will be parsed for every 2 values into a Vec2.

        Parameters:
        vertices - All vertices in the shape.

      • intersects

        Returns:
        Whether s intersects with this shape.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Shape s)
        Returns:
        Whether all vertices of s is inside of this shape.

      • contains

        Returns:
        Whether v is inside of this shape.

      • translate

        public Shape translate(float x,
                       float y)
        Moves all vertices by x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount every vertex should move on x.
        y - The amount every vertex should move on y.
        Returns:
        The Shape.

      • translateTo

        public Shape translateTo(float x,
                         float y)
        Moves all vertices to x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on y.
        Returns:
        The Shape.

                    float yOrigin,
                    float angle)
        Rotate the object relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        xOrigin - The origin's x.
        yOrigin - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate relative to the origin.
        Returns:
        The Shape.

        origy - The origin's y.

        The Shape.
